content: back of the sock is worked in plain row 2 rs sl1 k1 repeat across 28 32 36 sts 2 cherry pie socks by debbie ford repeat row 1 and 2 13 15 17 more times k to m sm this is now your bor and you can 14 16 18 in total remove the other st markers as you work the next round then work row 1 once more foot heel turn continue working in established pattern until row 1 rs sl1 k 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn the foot measures 4 cm / 1 5 inches less than row 2 ws sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn desired foot length row 3 rs sl1 k to 1 st before your last turn toe ssk using 1 st from each side of the gap k1 set up round k 28 32 36 pm k to end of turn round row 4 ws sl1 p to 1 st before your last round 1 k1 ssk k to 2 sts before marker turn p2tog using 1 st from each side of the k2tog sm k1 ssk k to 2 sts before end of gap p1 turn round k2tog 4 sts decreased repeats row 3-4 until all stitches have been round 2 k to end of round worked repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 20 28 you will have 18 20 22 sts on your needle 36 sts left and the rs should be facing you cut your working yarn leaving a tail of gusset approximately 38 cm 15 inches now you now you are going to start working in the can kitchener stitch your toe closed round again set up round this will be your bor place a marker if you wish k 18 20 22 pick up and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the row below and k tbl pm work row 1 of eyelet pattern pm pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the row below and k tbl pick up and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap round 1 k to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm work next row of the eyelet pattern across the front of sock sm ssk k to end of round round 2 k to m sm work next row of the eyelet pattern across the front of sock sm k to end of round repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have decreased down to your original stitch count with 28 32 36 sts on the back of your sock 3 cherry pie socks by debbie ford abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together knit knit k tbl knit through the back loop purl purl ssk sl1 knitwise sl1 knitwise place both sts back on the left needle and k2tog through the back loop pm place marker bor beginning of round sm slip marker repeat sts between brackets the indicated number of times
